Reviews.Title: “Cosy, cute and a good base to see most of Paris from”
Reviews.Author: Melanie R
Reviews.Content: stayed nights december 2010 booked online pleasantly surprised paris chic cute comfy breakfast included lovely plentiful day base paris close metro landmarks restaurants shops supermarkets stay
